\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 49506}

\subsection*{Wow! This Sucks}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Keller}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Calamus & roots\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 154.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
It sucked. It was cool for about 4 minutes with hallucinations, then, it hit me. I puked for about an hour and went back to bed. My girlfriend had gotten me a trash can which really came in handy. Every two hours I woke up and pucked for about 20 minutes. It wasnt so bad the next day, it felt sort of like a really small hangover, or like when I'm coming down from weed, plus a headache.

\end{document}
